directions: Beat cream cheese in large bowl until smooth. Mix in salsa, chilies and cilantro. Add clams and blend well. Season dip to taste with salt and pepper. Transfer to ovenproof dish. (Can be prepared 1 day ahead. Cover; chill.)
Preheat oven to 350°F. Bake dip uncovered until heated through and bubbling around edges, about 35 minutes.
Place bowl of dip on platter. Surround with chips and serve.
ingredients: 3/4 cup (about 6 ounces) purchased green chili salsa (salsa verde)
title: Mexican Clam Dip
